About the app: this app is designed to help Users that love reading books. 
it makes usage of all state of the art Technologies to ensure that the user has the best experience with their book. 
Including Features such as: 
Currently Reading section, a Wishlist, Favorites, and much more! 

About the Developer: 
I am Shai Grossman, Head of software at Excalibur #6738 FRC Team. 
This is my First app (and hopefully not the last ;). 
Please enjoy it.

It follows Harry Potters struggles through his fifth year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, including the surreptitious return of the antagonist Lord Voldemort, O.W.L. exams, and an obstructive Ministry of Magic.
Stories from the Life of Richard Feynman, a brilliant Physicist, and a Strange man
